overview:
Message Systems is a provider of email software solutions for email marketers, service providers and corporate enterprises.

Founded as OmniTI in 1997, Message Systems was formed when a team of visionary technologists realized existing message transport agents (MTAs) were failing to keep up with the explosive growth in email communications. In response, they created a standards-compliant MTA that eliminated racks of email servers running general purpose versions, thus reducing operating overhead. They put traditional thinking aside and established partnerships with integrators and software companies, anti-virus, anti-spam and reputation services to offer end-to-end email solutions.

Its Momentum Platform is used by companies such as Facebook, PayPal, Zynga, LivingSocial, Salesforce, LinkedIn, and Apple
